name: CountingTrainer
0:
”Alexa open Counting Trainer”
”Alexa tell Counting Trainer I want to practice”
”Alexa open Counting Trainer and teach me”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: counting trainer
des: There are two modes - learning and practice. In the learning mode Counting Trainer counts form one and you repeat. In the practice mode you start counting and Counting Trainer verifies and helps.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
